title: Modern Bucktown 1 bedroom convertible~ BALCONY, W/D IN UNIT,HW, DW,CTA
posting_body: PROPERTY INFO
Rent: $2,095 / Month
Beds: 1
Bath: 1
Available Date:
Wicker Park is the mecca of urban shopping and great eateries, right outside your door.
Ease and accessibility is a cinch to O’Hare airport and downtown with the CTA blue line just a short walk away.
I-90/94 is also a short drive, but you’re sure to enjoy this biker friendly neighborhood with the 606 bike path!
This sleek development offers a rooftop terrace with BBQ grills with lounge seating and breathtaking skyline vies.
Pressbox dry cleaning lockers, LuxerOne package delivery system and secure entries.
In each unit are in-unit W/D, custom Italian cabinetry and stained concrete flooring.
Kitchens are equipped with stainless steel Whirlpool appliances, quartz countertops and oversized Franke sink.
The sleek and refined finishes offer an elevated balance.
On site parking is available for an additional fee.
Cats and dogs are welcome, but breed restrictions apply and Fido is sure to love all the green space and dog parks in the area!
